guidelines: SEARCH/REPLACE blocks MUST follow the exact format specified in TOOL_DEFINITIONS.
SEARCH block MUST exactly match current file content.
Base next SEARCH block on latest system-provided file content (final_file_content/error file_content).
Apply changes in small, logical units.
One SEARCH/REPLACE block per replace_in_file call for clarity/safety.
NEVER include CDATA tags within the diff parameter content.

Diff String Completeness Check: Before generating a `replace_in_file` request, **MUST verify** that the generated `<diff>` string contains all markers (`^SEARCH^`, `^======^`, `^REPLACE^`) and that the entire XML block is properly closed (`</diff>`, `</replace_in_file>`).
Backup original before write_to_file, esp. critical files (confirm if unsure).
Confirm with the user before overwriting significant files if unsure.
NEVER include CDATA tags within the content parameter.
